website_summaries.verdict: A boxing reflex ball set that includes balls for multiple levels for the same price as many other sets.
pros: Includes 3 balls for different difficulty levels – the black ball is for beginners, the red ball is intermediate, and the green/yellow ball is the most difficult
cons: The elastic string comes untied from the ball occasionally

customer_reviews.title: Don’t try this drunk...
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this. No mounting a speedbag to my already overfilled game/gym room. I guess that similar to Tony Hawk skateboard and Dance Revolution, being sober may be important.
customer_reviews.author: Howza

customer_reviews.title: Balls Back
customer_reviews.text: Great items have lots of fun with it. Be careful with the wire as it can hit you in the eye or the ball to your balls. Keeping the combo can be tricky just don't get frustrated and take your time figuring out the power.
customer_reviews.author: Arman A

customer_reviews.title: Reflex Ball Band
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool. Can be a novelty item for most, but if taken serious, it can help you with focus and rhythm. The packaging was clean and shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Head strap, a little difficult to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be a very well made product! I’ve only had it for a little over a week, but I find it very useful. Good price for what you’re getting. The sellers are very nice and professional! The reason I give it a 4 is because my head is kind of small, so the velcro strap can be kind of difficult to adjust, but overall, very satisfied so far and I would buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The string is a little long. I have sort arms so I just wrap the string around the headband until I make sure the ball is at the same length as my fist. I recommend buying this product specifically from this vendor. It came to me as a full set (all three balls). My son bought this product from another vendor and it took him 2 months to receive it and It only had one ball included. :o( Buy this product from this vendor for your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good quallity and a effective product
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was simple but the product was also simple to use and absolutely effective. Since getting this product, I found myself urging to use it every day after work. For me, it's therapeutic and at the same time a great way to improve eye and hand coordination. There are three stages/levels when using it. I'm still on the first one but quickly improving to the second level. Not much else I can say but about it but its WORTH THE BUCKS you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reflex practice, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is super fun and awesome to improve hand eye coordination, but a couple of things: the string can get spun around a few times while punching, and won't always respond appropriately (I understand that the ball can go in all directions), but rather than a random direction, it sometimes "glitches" because the string is twisted; secondly, after about a week of use, the ball and string came apart on the black ball. It was easy to put back together (need a needle), but what can you expect from something under $20. All in all, my family, friends, and I are enjoying it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This is a good way to teach young trainees hand eye coordination and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good way to teach young trainees hand eye coordination and reflexes. And don't forget stick and move, sick and move. don't buy cheap crap that falls apart, buy this product if you want it to last for a few. DEFINATELY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time and well packaged. The equipment seems very sturdy. Now on to practicing. It’s not easy. I’m a older woman so I probably will need more practice than the younger group but I’m determined as this is good for concentration and reflex.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Baldor

customer_reviews.title: Every martial artist should have this!  If you don't get it, you will be behind!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I can use this all day long! My favourites to train with are the yellow one and the red one. Its very challenging, and awesome, I have so much fun with it! Update the yellow one broke while was being used, and I still was happy with the product and the seller contacted me, I am still happy with the product, and glad now that this company worries about their customers and give the extra mile, this company has great quality people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is something every combat Sports enthusiast should have in their gear bags. I Love warming up with this and love the looks I get when I hear this is really easy until they try it. It becomes very easy the more you use it
customer_reviews.author: Hermen

customer_reviews.title: easily adjustable. Just loop the string around the head ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easily adjustable. Just loop the string around the head band a few times to shorten it. This is a good way to teach young trainees hand eye coordination and reflexes. It will work for your young athlete for numerous sports not just striking. Perfect training equipment which is 360 degrees all-round blow and reflex quickly to improve your concentration ,hand-eye coordination and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Chen Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Great cardio trainer
customer_reviews.text: This system is great for hand eye coordination and cardio training. After using this for 20 minutes my shoulders were on fire and I had built up a good sweat. The only ball that I did not like was the tennis ball. It does not return very well when hit. The other two balls hit and returned well. I would suggest using eye protection because the string will hit you in the eye unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: dominic john koorn

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cool and does work with hand-eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cool and does work with hand-eye coordination. It says that the black ball is the beginner's ball. Yet it's the black ball that I initially had the most trouble with. The yellow tennis ball was the easiest for me to get a rhythm going with. But maybe they mark the black ball as the "beginner's" ball because it's the softest. Otherwise, I really like it as a training tool.
customer_reviews.author: Juan A. Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Eyes Hurt
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to like this, I have been boxing for about 2 years and needed some at home stuff for head movement, but it just nails me in the eye when I put any power into it, and then when trying to adjust the strings they immediately broke and whipped me in the eyes. I hate it, if you're less experienced maybe it's worth it? but who knows
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not to satisfied with this one
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that come with this do not tell you anything on how to properly install or how to use the item. The only way to know how to use this unit is to watch youtube videos and see how other people are using theirs and try your best.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic swasey

customer_reviews.title: worthless for training
customer_reviews.text: clumsy design and poor quality materials, save your money and go to a boxing gym or get a boxing bag
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised BUT there is one thing not advertised and most important to know: the string attaching the ball to the head band. The string is elastic, which is OK, but it is very thin and stretches after some usage. And thus, this item DOESN'T LAST LONG.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. The Velcro and ball always fall off. Doesn’t work as described. Overall complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice boxing reflex ball
customer_reviews.text: I love this boxing reflex ball. It's a little difficult at first, you can start with black ball and start with small punches until you get the rhythm, you should progress quickly. The material for the balls is soft and spongy so while it can come back and hit you, it's soft enough that it doesn't hurt. These are high quality reflex punching balls. You can use this to improve reflex and balance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for th grandkids! This comes with a headband and the headband works ok but we had better luck wearing a baseball cap backwards and fastening th Velcro to the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Kuchta

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it comes with three different balls and strings allows you to improve from one level to the next. This product comes with instructions to show you which level is which, which is really helpful if you're a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What you expect but lower quality.
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t any real way to attach the string to the helmet, and the overall quality of the whole thing just seems poorly made. It comes in a wimpy plastic bag and has no instructions. You’re better off spending five more dollars and getting a real one.
customer_reviews.author: Logan P

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for working on your reflex when you by yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a very product to amp your reflexes, This will help with at been more accurate with your target. Also it will help you with your patience. I like this reflex ball. Same concept as the soccer ball attached to your waist!
customer_reviews.author: Andrés

customer_reviews.title: Fun warmup
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot more fun than just shadowboxing. Better than my homemade version I was using before this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and Eye–hand coordination
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and decided to get another one for myself. We both love it. This is also great exercise. Will def get your heart rate up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the Velcro straps suck
customer_reviews.text: Headband is nice and comfortable the balls seem sturdy enough each with their respective strings that seem they will hold well, my biggest problem is the Velcro straps that they come with are garbage ones already falling apart and its two pieces holding one string? Why not one double sided piece? Dumb imo buying different velcro and making it work better myself.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Menard

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not what it looks like, and isnt easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really helps with focusing your punches.
customer_reviews.text: Love the head band. It’s not annoying to wear on my head and the ability to change the balls is really useful. I’m definitely getting improvements since I started using the reflex balls. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Josemart78

customer_reviews.title: Good quality if treat it right
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely a challenge. It works good after you get the hang of it. Good practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t happy with this model the headband sucks and the ball is too soft
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t happy with this model the headband sucks and the ball is too soft
customer_reviews.author: James postell

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: The ring that you tie the string to broke after 2 days. I pulled on it to tighten up the elastic string and it pulled right through the ring. I couldn't believe it. Put some tape around it and it works well. The product is cheap but what do you expect........ Overall I like the product. It's hard to get the hang of it at first
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Very happy about my boxing reflexes equipment..
customer_reviews.text: Thank you 🙏, I’ve bought a few items of this caliber... I like to say the fact that it has 3 different balls to work with and the price it’s awesome. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I consider this item to be a useful tool for eye/hand coordination. Headband should have a slit in center to guide string.
customer_reviews.author: electrogizmo

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use it sometimes and it’s fun to play with.my eye is getting better
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting use to but I am enjoying this thing. Looking forward to getting good at it so I can show off. Nice quality and with 3 balls and some care should last.
customer_reviews.author: Zay4President

customer_reviews.title: Not easy but worthwhile takes time to master
customer_reviews.text: It was harder than expected definitely takes practice but great tool
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Lot of elastic to adjust it to the length you want. Definitely suggest starting slow and steady then building up speed
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Good training product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it comes with three levels(3 balls).So you can advance once you master each ball.Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but incomplete product.
customer_reviews.text: One of the balls falls off the string very easily and the end of the string doesn’t have a Velcro strap like the other balls. There are no instructions. Besides that I think it’s fun training with it if you can keep the string from coming off the headband
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: How do you use this?
customer_reviews.text: This cake with no instructions. It doesn’t tell you how long the cord should be, which ball to start with or anything. I thought this was a good product but I can’t even use it!
customer_reviews.author: Omari Aljoe

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: solid product. been using it for 1+ week and i am enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: hakeem s

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this. He says it’s a lot of fun

customer_reviews.title: F U N
customer_reviews.text: The kids had a blast in Christmas Eve with Bixing Fight Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this almost every day until my dog chewed it up while i was at work, will definantly be buying a new one!

customer_reviews.title: Like It a Lot
customer_reviews.text: Make my day, is going to be hard to get some skills for this thing, I like It

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable. Good price for quality of product. Easy to use with some patience as intended to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this to anyone training for a martial arts contest.
customer_reviews.author: njparent

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's fun, and a great way to develop hand/eye coordination and reaction to an incoming target. It's a excellent value. You'll get more than your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I am still using the beginner one. It works well. I could punch it for two hours without feeling boring.
customer_reviews.author: fan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was able to better his hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good for concentration practice!
customer_reviews.text: This boxing ball(3 balls inside actually!) is a simple-design, but you will need to practice a bit till enjoy playing with it, it will be a really good practice toy. It's a super fun way to practice boxing or hand-eye coordination, fun practice time really made! Could be a great family time activity as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joey_00

customer_reviews.title: Great product, use it often
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is that the ball gets untied from the string at least once during each session I do. It’s not a major problem or anything, but it is an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Keith

customer_reviews.title: staying active during the pandemic
customer_reviews.text: My son is definitely having fun with this during the pandemic isolation. He had to adjust the length of the elastic but he's been using it for days now and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: SandyS

customer_reviews.title: It was fun,
customer_reviews.text: Well we have only tried it once, so mostly it was fun, hard to do and involved a lot of giggling on my daughter's part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It should have come with more instructions on how to make the length correct for use. I found it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what was shown & is a great item to work out with. Came in a timely manner No complaints what so ever
customer_reviews.author: Churboi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hand eye fighting ball
customer_reviews.text: The headband is dumb i just tacked it to the ceiling through the velcro its fun you'll start making up diffrent games to pay with it and you get up an helps balance
customer_reviews.author: Ian W.

customer_reviews.title: Green ball doesn’t have a proper fixture so it doesn’t hold well at the head band
customer_reviews.text: No clear instruction how to fix the balls on the head band. Also the green ball doesn’t have a proper length and fixture at its end so you have to manually attach it to head band.
customer_reviews.author: Jenek

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised with everything that was supposed to be there. It takes a little practice but is fun and keeps ya moving.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: At my age this product helps keep my reaction quick as it can be.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and as advertised. Good product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great, no complaints, everything was in the package. Great deal.

customer_reviews.title: Great for eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: Great product recommended to anyone that want to increase there “eye coordination” can possibly make bad habits for boxing in sparring

customer_reviews.title: Super useful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This boxing fight ball is good to increase hand eye coordination. It is super useful!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best $12 ive spent in a while. Will keep you busy forever. Gets easier after you do it for a bit.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product with 3 different levels
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to hit this thing and improve on timing!

customer_reviews.title: Great for timing and hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: As a boxer myself getting ready for my fights I love using this it does help alot I notice it in sparring

customer_reviews.title: Do not Recommend

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like a product with a good price and quality.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, it is just as the description. Great way to improve hand and eye coordination. Will definitely purchase again from vendor.

customer_reviews.title: Fun !
customer_reviews.text: Super fun training tool that you can pick Up at anytime and use it .

customer_reviews.title: Actually worked as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot, quite fun and it’s very helpful to improve your reflexes

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with instructions... but I found this video on YouTube it may help... 🤙

customer_reviews.title: Can’t rate it at this time.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a gift. It hasn’t been opened yet.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how to use this thing but it sure is fun

customer_reviews.title: Great and Fun Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love the fact that three different balls arrive for different levels (Beginners, Intermediate, and Advanced). It is definitely a lot harder to use than I expected. But with some time you get the hang of it. I enjoy using it. I would recommend for others. So far I have only used the beginner ball because I am learning. All three balls bring their own string so that makes it better because it makes switching from one level to the next a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The elastic band popped while using and no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Didnt come with instructions. Took forever to attach the string before just tying it in a knot(tacky). after about 20 min of using it, the band popped and hit me in the eye while the ball flew across the room. Dont even trust using it anymore. Not really worth $20 i feel like i could have scrapped up some materials myself and that would have done better.
customer_reviews.author: malik

customer_reviews.title: Get the real headband with the hook
customer_reviews.text: I didnt even get to use it the glue holding the strap just fell off
customer_reviews.author: santana

customer_reviews.title: Good for rhythm and coordination
customer_reviews.text: Good for rhythm and coordination.The headband is comfortable and adjustable, the design of the perspiration groove and ventilation is great!Nice packing and pretty neat training tool! It's better than the similar products' elastics.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came without instructions. I put it together hit it once and it came back and smacked me in the eye. Don’t want my son to injure himself using it. Can’t imagine how this ever got to market. DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.author: John r lee

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Velcro didn’t stay “stuck” rendering it useless. We returned it. 👎
customer_reviews.author: avaraa

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass!
customer_reviews.text: The thing comes with zero instruction so I just figured the Velcro strap attaches to the center of the head band. It is very uncomfortable as it scratches your head. Thought it would be a good intro into hand eye coordination for my grandsons... I was wrong on this one!
customer_reviews.author: tim poor

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and kind of dingy
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 as presents for my siblings. Was kind of disappointed with the instructions provided on how to attach the string to the headband (the instructions just say "attach" and there is some 8 feet of string and no great way to just hook it on in a reliable/symmetrical way). I emailed them to ask about a video and their response was not helpful at all and just asked for a review. I tried to find a video on youtube or their website, too, to help but didn't find anything. Not worth the price for the lack of instructions/means to attach the string and ball to the headband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is seriously a piece of crap from China. It is made so poorly. In addition, you have to tape the velcro against the headband. It then rubs against your skin each time you try to hit the ball. Get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: navym

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Cheaply made, you'd be better off rigging up something on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Graas

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Nylon string from tennis ball level ripped off during use. It had nothing to do with me. Got whipped in the eyes and face from string super painful wish I could get money back.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was 3 sets, but aparrently it is 1 set with 3 balls. This is also very difficult to use. Houts of practice yielded more frustration than actual exercise. Stay away from this gimmick. I do not reccomend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: John C Hardell III

customer_reviews.title: I would not use this for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He did not like the fact of having to tie the strings to the headband you used. You have to cut the strings to adjust for your arm length. He opened the package looked at everything trying to figure out how it worked and then he decided that it wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Tee

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: I think this is simply a scam. You get the product and it’s broken, poor quality and impossible to use. This is what I would call a scam.
customer_reviews.author: acustomer

product_meta.title: Boxing Fight Ball Reflex for Improving Speed Reactions and Hand Eye Coordination£¬Boxing Punch Equipment for Boxing, MMA and Other Combat Sports Training and Fitness
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL REFLEX TRAINING:The best way to improve hand eye coordination and reflex. This boxing speed ball is a good choice for increasing kids' eye-hand coordination, reflexes, agility while enjoying themselves.

WIDELY APPLICABLE:It is suitable for man or woman, teenager or child, even boxing trainer. You don't have to be a professional boxer to use fight ball! Everyone can use it to train, have fun or release stres

LET THE CALORIES BURNING:Maybe you are accustomed to lifting weights or running on the treadmill, but fight Ball might be even better and far more compelling. The unpredictability of the rebounding ball, coupled with the intensity of your punches will really burn out your arms, chest, shoulders and upper back, perfect for calorie burning and conditioning! In addition, it's very addicting!

PRACTICE ANYTIME AND ANYWHERE:Have no motivation to workout at home? Do not want to go gym? No worries, this punching ball can do a big favour, it is so lightweight and portable, which means you can take it with you to anywhere. Perfect for work breaks or school breaks or even for the beach and the park.

3 BOXING TRAING BALLS ,3 DIFFICLUTY LEVELS:Are you worrying about it's difficult to get the hang? The black ball is specifically designed to be much easier for novices. Once you could dominate it, change to the red ball. Watch out the red ball, it's much more active. When you could dominate the red ball, you can try the green ball(60g) which is the most difficult. It is more heavier. You may be knockout technically.
